text: The telescopefish, or giganturas, comprise a genus, Gigantura, of small, deep- sea ray-finned fish in the family Giganturidae. Though rarely captured, they are found in cold, deep tropical to subtropical waters worldwide. == Species == The currently recognized species in this genus are: * Gigantura chuni A. B. Brauer, 1901 (giant gigantura) * Gigantura indica A. B. Brauer, 1901 (telescopefish) == Related pages == * Bowfin * Atractosteus * Atractosteus africanus * List of fish common names * List of prehistoric bony fish genera == References == # Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2012). Species of Gigantura in FishBase. April 2012 version. Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Telescopefish
